long_description: Bending Branches blended beauty and performance to come up with the Espresso Plus canoe paddle! Seven-laminate black willow blade provides a powerful stroke for excellent flatwater cruising performance. Rockgard(R) protects the paddle blade, wrapping around the corners onto blade edges. Ergonomically designed contour grip and ovalized shaft provide hours of paddling comfort. Multiple-step varnishing process extends life of paddle.
short_description: Bending Branches blended beauty and performance to come up with the Espresso Plus canoe paddle!
